type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Player Model Type

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/player_model_type).

Check whether an `AbstractClientPlayerEntity` uses the `DEFAULT` or `SLIM` model type.

Type ID: `apugli:player_model_type`



---

### ⚠️ Caution

This condition is only effective client-side. That means any server-sided power types will not work as intended.





---

## Player Model Type

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/player_model_type).

Check whether an `AbstractClientPlayerEntity` uses the `DEFAULT` or `SLIM` model type.

Type ID: `apugli:player_model_type`



---

### ⚠️ Caution

This condition is only effective client-side. That means any server-sided power types will not work as intended.





---

model_type.description: The model type to check for. Can be either `"default"` OR `"slim`.
